titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Zabriskie Family Papers 1790-1976.
titlestmt.author: Pamela Cooley

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created with EADitor by user nycoofam.
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

accessrestrict.p: Coll. No. 64: Zabriskie Family Papers is open for research according to the regulations of Fenimore Art Museum Library.

bioghist.p: Charles F. Zabriskie was a photographer in Cooperstown, Otsego County, N.Y.

scopecontent.p: Family correspondence, deeds, wills, genealogical data, travel mementos, patents, clippings,and scrapbooks of Charles F. Zabriskie (CFZ) and his son Charles Lemaire Zabriskie (CLZ) of Cooperstown. Also documents of Jean LeMaire, an immigrant from France.
